body:
Hey guys, I have a question.
Is there going to be any Map Developer spots open or to apply? I wanna take a shot at being one. Can somoen help me out by giving me info?
Thanks!
body_tagged:
Hey guys, I have a question.
Is there going to be any Map Developer spots open or to apply? I wanna take a shot at being one. Can somoen help me out by giving me info?
Thanks!
title: Staff Application for Map Developers

replies.body:
There are no applications for map developer. You are hand picked.
More information
replies.body_tagged:
There are no applications for map developer. You are hand picked.
More information

replies.body: I don't think it is currently possible to apply for said position. Map devs are hand-picked as far as I know. If you wish to be one, I suggest not being blatant that you're doing things because of it, and go ahead and prove you are good with maps.
replies.body_tagged: I don't think it is currently possible to apply for said position. Map devs are hand-picked as far as I know. If you wish to be one, I suggest not being blatant that you're doing things because of it, and go ahead and prove you are good with maps.

replies.body: Okay so do you guys suggest I try to make a map?
replies.body_tagged: Okay so do you guys suggest I try to make a map?

replies.body: Go ahead, I'd suggest checking out this post https://avicus.net/forums/7b06d685d
replies.body_tagged: Go ahead, I'd suggest checking out this post https://avicus.net/forums/7b06d685d

reply_to.body: Okay so do you guys suggest I try to make a map?

replies.body: Yea I was just reading that xD
replies.body_tagged: Yea I was just reading that xD

replies.body:
I'm just going to lock this as your question has been answered. I'm sure map developers or fellow map creators will be willing to help you with a map, try contacting them!

Locking.
